QuestData.Title: Forensic Ecology
QuestData.Description:
I'm at my wits end, $n. Tharu and I have made our way through nearly all the corpses only to stumble at the end because we cannot agree on a methodology. If only he would just listen to me!
<Ecologist Iskha sighs.>
The stress of the situation is getting to us both. I don't even have a firm hypothesis yet.
You look like you have a strong stomach. Will you take over on these last two gorlocs? You can borrow my scalpel.
